amendment.description: An amendment numbered 66 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to reduce the salary of Kristie Canegallo, Deputy Secretary of Homeland Security, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 261 (Roll no. 458).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 261 (Roll no. 458).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
